description:
Support your training and running goals. The newest version of the Cloudflyer features a moulded sockliner and external heel counter for serious comfort and stability. The wider base and specially designed pods resist inward rotation to benefit overpronators.

  • Engineered mesh upper is lightweight and breathable
  • Moulded first-layer sockliner ensures a comfortable fit
  • Star-lacing system and plush tongue provide a snug fit without top-of-foot pressure
  • Helion™ superfoam midsole stabilizes and supports your feet
  • External 3D-moulded heel counter adds stability
  • Speedboard® provides responsive flex and rocker that encourages the natural rolling process, promotes explosive take-offs
  • CloudTec® sole with Zero-Gravity foam for plenty of cushion
  • CloudTec® pods independently cushion and propel you precisely where you need to go
name: On Cloudflyer 4 Road Running Shoes - Women's
